comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: He's not this J. F. Archibald: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._F._Archibald James Francis Jewell Archibald was an American journalist aboard the Rotterdam in August 1915, when he was detained by British authorities. He was carrying papers that revealed a plot to disrupt American munitions production by fomenting labor unrest at plants such as the Bethlehem Iron Works. The "Dumba Affair" is explained in this entry on the Austro-Hungarian ambassador who was expelled as a result: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konstantin_Dumba
